Content.Text:
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Mmmmm, lovely. Your tea gets better and
better each time I drink it, Olivia.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I know. I make it in almost the same
way, and yet yours tastes so much
better!

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you for your kind words. You honor
me.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
All of that, and you've got a wonderful
figure too, Olivia. I'm quite jealous of
you!

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh Rebecca, you need to look in a
mirror! You're very glamorous yourself.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Oh please, you're kidding...

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
No need for such humility. You agree
with me, Camellia, right?

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Of course I do. It isn't like I have
anything to offer. Hah!

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Sorry, Olivia. Camellia is a little
sensitive about her figure.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
She is?

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hello? I'm right here!
<PAGE>
Just because your so voluptuous, don't
go letting it get to your head!

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
We aren't! You're the one on the
offensive here.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I can't stand people like you, boasting
about their bodies.
<PAGE>
Give it a few more years and you'll be
sagging all over the place. You'll see!

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
What? Hey, I take care of myself. That's
never going to happen to me!

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You sure about that?

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Please, both of you. Calm down.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
It's your oversensitive nature that's
stunted your growth, I'm sure.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What was that? I can't overlook that
comment!
<PAGE>
You hate it when people comment on how
slender and slim I am, don't you?
<PAGE>
Who was it who said, "I'm not glamorous,
I'm just fat!"?

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
I never said that! Don't put words in my
mouth!

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Rebecca is very glamorous, to be sure.
<PAGE>
But Camellia, you are also very slender
and attractive.
<PAGE>
I don't think either of you should be
worrying about what you don't have.
<PAGE>
And we are in the middle of town here, 
so maybe we should keep our voices down.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Y-Yes you're right. Sorry, I just got
carried away...

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I totally forgot where we are, too!

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You two... you're like two troublesome
young teenagers!

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm also quite jealous of you both,
being able to fight so frankly and yet
remain great friends.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sorry, Camellia.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
No, allow me to apologize too.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let's change the subject, then. I'll
get us all some more tea.
